name: Sentinel 333 Green All-Purpose Cleaner & Degreaser
description: Sentinel 333 Green All-Purpose Cleaner & Degreaser is a concentrated, environmentally friendly, biodegradable cleaner & degreaser. Sentinel 333 Green contains no hazardous ingredients. With incredible penetrating and wetting qualities, Sentinel 333 Green reduces surface tension for efficient soil removal. Sentinel 333 Green is more effective than traditional cleaning products that attempt to break down soils with hazardous chemistry.
